1024x768 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Ivonne,
That’s great! The next steps will be for me to reach out to the client and I can send them the Introduction to MBO Partners as well as a brief description of MBO and our MSA so I can introduce myself and get the ball rolling on the contract. If they want to use their contract at that time they can send it to me and I will have it reviewed and make any necessary changes based on our business model. You do not need to send them the work order, that is just there if you ever want to send a client a blank SOW for them to fill out, but normally I would send that to them along with our MSA.
The paperwork I will need from them with me a contract (either ours or theirs, fully executed) and a SOW.
The next steps for you will be for you to complete the enrollment in our system. I will send you a link to enroll, and you will follow that link to our site and complete the online paperwork. Once the online enrollment is complete there will be and enrollment packet that you can print off and in that packet is an I9 form (its page 13 or 14). You will take that form to a local notary and have them witness your signature and sign in section 2 as an authorized representative. You just need to fax or email me that form back and that will complete your portion of the paperwork.
In order to activate your account I will need the I9 form, the contract from the client and a SOW detailing your work (this can be our work order form or something from the client).
Please let me know if you have any additional questions and you should receive the link to enroll in a few minutes.
Thank you, Nicolette
